DrillBook.html:
DrillBook is a marching band drill creation software. It is designed to help drill writers and band directors create, edit, and print drill pages with ease and control.

  • Java
  • ● Maven
  • ● Ant

SocialSave.html:
Created during the hackathon at the Capital One Software Engineering Summit, SocialSave is a prototype Android App that is designed to revolutionize the way people save money.

  • Java
  • ● Firebase
  • ● Python

Pitch,Please.html:
Created as a group project for "Preview of Computer Science", Pitch, Please is an Android App designed to facilitate the self-improvement of musicians. The app has a pitch generation mode, a pitch guessing mode, an interval guessing mode, and a composer guessing mode.

  • Java
  • ● Android
  • ● Spotify API

TextToText.html:
TextToText is a console application that turns SMS or Google Hangouts message logs into arbitrary-length "Screenshots"

  • Java

DrillBookElectron.html:
Revamping DrillBook to be built in Electron for a cleaner UI and distribution process.

  • Electron
  • ● NodeJS
  • ● JavaScript
  • ● TypeScript

  • ● CSS3

Billiard.html:
Billiard uses geographical information to help you make the most efficient carpooling routes.

  • Bootstrap
  • ● Google Maps API
  • ● Amazon DynamoDB
  • ● JavaScript

Chord.html:
This Firebase-integrated web application for musicians makes it easy to record your practice and leave feedback at a particular timestamp in the audio. This application won first place in the DevFest DC Fall 2017 Hackathon.

  • Bootstrap
  • ● Firebase
  • ● JavaScript
  • ● HTML5
  • ● CSS3
